sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnannvrsrymanage ( ANNVRSRY_ID /* */ , USER_ID /* */ , ANNVRSRY_SE /* */ , ANNVRSRY_NM /* */ , ANNVRSRY /* */ , CLDR_SE /* */ , ANNVRSRY_NTCN_SETUP /* */ , ANNVRSRY_NTCN_BGNDE /* */ , MEMO /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , REPTIT_AT /* */ ) VALUES ( #annvrsryId# /* */ , #userId# /* */ , #annvrsrySe# /* */ , #annvrsryNm# /* */ , #annvrsry# /* */ , #cldrSe# /* */ , #annvrsryNtcnSetup# /* */ , #annvrsryNtcnBgnde# /* */ , #memo# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #reptitAt# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnannvrsrymanage SET ANNVRSRY_ID=#annvrsryId# /* */ , USER_ID=#userId# /* */ , ANNVRSRY_SE=#annvrsrySe# /* */ , ANNVRSRY_NM=#annvrsryNm# /* */ , ANNVRSRY=#annvrsry# /* */ , CLDR_SE=#cldrSe# /* */ , ANNVRSRY_NTCN_SETUP=#annvrsryNtcnSetup# /* */ , ANNVRSRY_NTCN_BGNDE=#annvrsryNtcnBgnde# /* */ , MEMO=#memo# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ , REPTIT_AT=#reptitAt# /* */ WHERE ANNVRSRY_ID=#annvrsryId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT ANNVRSRY_ID /* */ , USER_ID /* */ , ANNVRSRY_SE /* */ , ANNVRSRY_NM /* */ , ANNVRSRY /* */ , CLDR_SE /* */ , ANNVRSRY_NTCN_SETUP /* */ , ANNVRSRY_NTCN_BGNDE /* */ , MEMO /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , REPTIT_AT /* */ FROM comtnannvrsrymanage WHERE ANNVRSRY_ID=#annvrsryId# /* */

SELECT ANNVRSRY_ID /* */ , USER_ID /* */ , ANNVRSRY_SE /* */ , ANNVRSRY_NM /* */ , ANNVRSRY /* */ , CLDR_SE /* */ , ANNVRSRY_NTCN_SETUP /* */ , ANNVRSRY_NTCN_BGNDE /* */ , MEMO /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , REPTIT_AT /* */ FROM comtnannvrsrymanage WHERE 1=1
ANNVRSRY_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY ANNVRSRY_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnannvrsrymanage WHERE 1=1
ANNVRSRY_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
